body_html:
I am trying to wrap my ahead around why Windows support is highly experimental..... Isn't Windows a large installation base? Don't most of us have Nvidia cards? Especially now that deep learning is becoming so popular, it's well worth the effort to make Windows/Java support stable.

Anyway, I will solve this myself. In the end, I may just write my own deep learning framework for Windows and Java.
body_text:
I am trying to wrap my ahead around why Windows support is highly experimental..... Isn't Windows a large installation base? Don't most of us have Nvidia cards?  Especially now that deep learning is becoming so popular, it's well worth the effort to make Windows/Java support stable.
Anyway, I will solve this myself. In the end, I may just write my own deep learning framework for Windows and Java.
body:
I am trying to wrap my ahead around why Windows support is highly experimental..... Isn't Windows a large installation base? Don't most of us have Nvidia cards?  Especially now that deep learning is becoming so popular, it's well worth the effort to make Windows/Java support stable. 

Anyway, I will solve this myself. In the end, I may just write my own deep learning framework for Windows and Java.
